title: (x) Toy block style fonts - various {gang}
content:
Please list any similar fonts to this toy block style. Thanks!   
   
 ![toyblock](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210104836im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/9251.jpg)

 [‹ "How To Lose A Guy..." movie title font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210104836/http:/typophile.com/node/11080 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) FBI logo - stretched Impact {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210104836/http:/typophile.com/node/72 "Go to next forum topic")
author: snowboard

comments.content: There's a freeware font like that. Let me look it up.

[Maniackers Design\*](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210104836/http:/mks.jp.org/) have a freeware Illustrator EPS-file called [Old Cube](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210104836/http:/www2.wind.ne.jp/maniackers/oldcube.html).   
   
 _(\*) A Japanese site but the navigation is in english and so are [a lot of the fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210104836/http:/www2.wind.ne.jp/maniackers/designfont.html).   
Freeware and Shareware. The designs are very cutting edge and fun. Great quality.   
Ok character sets. Mac TT, Mac Type 1 and Win formats available._      
text: Fontlover.com   
   
 ![OldCube](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210104836im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/10536.jpg)
